summary: MY SON WAS INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT WITH OUR 1999 MUSTANG GT. THE VEHICLE HAS 35,000 MILES ON IT. VIN # [XXX]. MY SON 'T-BONED' A VEHICLE AT APPROXIMATELY 30-35 MPH.  OUR VEHICLE SUSTAINED $8000 IN FRONT END DAMAGE.  NEITHER THE DRIVERS OR PASSENGERS AIR BAG DEPLOYED.  MY SON AND HIS PASSENGER WERE TRANSPORTED BY AMBULANCE TO THE HOSPITAL WITH NECK AND BACK PAIN.  THE POLICE AND AMBULANCE DRIVER BOTH SAID THE AIR BAGS SHOULD HAVE DEPLOYED BASED ON THE SEVERITY OF THE CRASH.   *NLM    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
